project_plan.name: Random Password Generator
project_plan.description: Develop a Python script that generates a random password with configurable length and includes uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters.

task.name: Implement the function to generate a random password based on user-defined length
Ensure the password includes uppercase letters, lowercase letters, numbers, and special characters
Write tests for the password generator function to validate the length and character types
Execute tests on the password generator to ensure it functions correctly
